participants: georgia chestnuts rust-ing on an open fire

messages.sender: georgia chestnuts rust-ing on an open fire
messages.message: Hi all! :wave: I'm trying to make a demo with a japanese invoice in refiner - does anyone have experience building flows in other languages and can help me? Also, if you can read Japanese please let me know!
The flow-writing process should remain the same, I’ve done a few Chinese govt tax receipts before and used Google Translate for the labels
But yes having a speaker/reader is faster and likely more accurate!

messages.sender: georgia chestnuts rust-ing on an open fire

messages.message: It's pretty atrophied, but if it would help to have eyes that -- at least at one point -- were pretty familiar with it, happy to put heads together
